sentences.en: A wave of superstitious fear spread among the townspeople.
sentences.cn: 盲目的恐惧感在市民中蔓延。

sentences.en: At first there was some resistance from local townspeople toward outsiders.
sentences.cn: 他们主要是在当地的三个大型鸡肉加工厂工作.

sentences.en: Farmers were meant to get an income comparable to that of townspeople.
sentences.cn: 农民的收入本应该与城里人的收入相当。

sentences.en: Food shortages forced many townspeople into the country to grow their own food.
sentences.cn: 食物短缺迫使很多市民到农村自己种粮食。

sentences.en: The flood cut the townspeople off from the rest of the world.
sentences.cn: 洪水割断了该镇居民与外界的联系.

sentences.en: The local townspeople usually did their buying then.
sentences.cn: 本镇的人家买东西大概在下午.

sentences.en: the proud townspeople of Semer Water
sentences.cn: 塞默－沃特城自豪的居民们

sentences.en: The students were reckless fellows who often fought with the townspeople.
sentences.cn: 学生们都常常卤莽地和镇上的人搏斗.

sentences.en: The townspeople allied themselves in the fight for lower taxes.
sentences.cn: 市民在为降低税收的斗争中联合起来了.

sentences.en: The townspeople received billets ordering them to lodge the regiment overnight.
sentences.cn: 镇民接到命令,要为一团官兵提供一夜住宿.

sentences.en: The troops were there to protect the townspeople.
sentences.cn: 部队驻扎在那里以保护市民.

sentences.en: There are humorous poems, joking commentaries on the news, and satirical observations of fellow townspeople.
sentences.cn: 有诸如幽默诗, 诙谐的新闻评论, 讽刺当地市民的小品文等.

sentences.en: Townspeople are very restless and they're always making trouble - "
sentences.cn: 大都市的人性好动,喜欢胡闹 —— ”

sentences.en: We arrange with the townspeople to billet the students.
sentences.cn: 我们和镇上人协商给学生提供宿舍.

sentences.en: You want us to do it in front of the townspeople?
sentences.cn: 你想要我们在全镇人的面前杀了他?

words.tran_cn: 市民；镇民；城里生长的人

trans.tran_cn: 市民，镇民，城里人，市井之流
trans.tran_en: all the people who live in a particular town
